alert.note: Alert for Newton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 12:56PM CDT until May 15 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL NEWTON COUNTY... At 1256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area, or 14 miles west of Jasper, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Lost Valley State Park... Erbie... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Pruitt... Wayton... Boxley... Mossville... Marble Falls... Low Gap... Crossroad... Parthenon... Gum Springs in Newton County... Ponca... Mt Sherman... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
